title: Regge-Liouville action from group theory
abstract: We work out the constraints imposed by SL(2C) invariance for sphere topology and modular invariance for torus topology, on the discretized form of Liouville action in Polyakov's non local covariant form. These are sufficient to completely fix the discretized action except for the overall normalization constant and a term which in the continuum limit goes over to a topological invariant. The treatment can be extended to the supersymmetric case.
